job.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
job.description: stronguAbout MeterbrbrustrongMeter is developing nextgeneration volumetric imaging technology We are building a machine that can see inside of anything and cloudbased software for processing the complex volumetric data that the machine produces Our technology will give engineers designers and eventually medical practitioners more confidence in their processes and lower the barrier to high quality imaging and inspection toolsbrbrOur team of engineers includes worldclass researchers industrial designers PhDs founders of successful startups and zero egos We are backed by some of the top venture capital funds and angel investors in Silicon Valley and beyond The company is headquartered in Cambridge MA and has an office in San Francisco CAbrbrstronguAbout The RolebrbrustrongWork closely with Meters hardware team to develop cutting edge software systems Systemsthinking and the ability to evaluate a problem from multiple perspectives is a must We are developing customerfacing software grounded in an innovative technology stack This role will involve understanding data flow through a complex hardwaresoftware system characterizing and optimizing performance of different parts of the system rapidly prototyping potential solutions and always keeping the customer in mindbrbrIf you are interested in joining a well funded growth stage company this is the perfect opportunity for you to become a part of the Meter team This role can be located in either Meters San Francisco or Boston office You may be required to travel occasionally between the two officesbrbrstrongThe JobbrstrongululliBuild a software product from the ground upliliWork with an interdisciplinary team on a complex hardwaresoftware problemliliImplement stateoftheart algorithms for 3D imagevolume reconstructionliliInform the technical development of a fast moving software productliliRapidly iterate on prototypes and build production softwarebrbrliululstrongYoubrstrongululliHave designed and implemented software throughout its lifecycle taking a product from napkin sketches through shipping and maintenanceliliHave a strong grounding in computer science fundamentals liliAre able to communicate complex technical problems to peers from different backgroundsliliAre comfortable prototyping and building high performance web apps with ReactAngularliliHave worked with AWS services S3 EC2 ECS Azure or GCP familiar with Docker KubernetesbrbrliululstrongBonus points for brstrongululliExperience with computational imaging image processing and 3D graphicsdata voxels meshesliliFamiliarity with scientific computing in PythonC liliFamiliarity with GPU programming CUDA liliExperience working in manufacturing industrial inspection or medical imagingliliA portfolio of your past work you can sharebrbrliululLIMETERbrbrMeter offers both competitive cash and equity compensation We have a generous vacation policy as well as paid parental leave health dental vision retirement and commuter benefitsbrbrIn keeping with our beliefs and goals no employee or applicant will face discrimination or harassment based on race color ancestry national origin religion age gender marital domestic partner status sexual orientation gender identity disability status or veteran status Above and beyond discrimination or harassment based on protected categories Meter also strives to prevent other subtler forms of inappropriate behavior from ever gaining a foothold in our company Whether blatant or hidden barriers to success have no place at MeterbrbrReach out if you want to be a part of what we are buildingbrbrSan Francisco Applicants Review the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance guidelines applicable in your area
